languages.text: "Жаль..." {n}Плечи хормейстера обмякают, выражение лица принимает привычное угрюмое выражение.{/n} "Я надеялся, что это любопытное донесение отвлечет вас от опасной идеи, с которой вы прибыли, и мне не придется умолять вас одуматься".

"Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."
languages.original_text: "Жаль..." {n}Плечи хормейстера обмякают, выражение лица принимает привычное угрюмое выражение.{/n} "Я надеялся, что это любопытное донесение отвлечет вас от опасной идеи, с которой вы прибыли, и мне не придется умолять вас одуматься".

languages.text: «Lástima...». {n}El maestro del Coro deja caer los hombros y su rostro vuelve a adoptar su habitual expresión taciturna.{/n} «Esperaba que eso fuera lo bastante interesante para distraerl{mf|e|a} de la peligrosa idea que le trajo aquí, para no tener que implorarle que lo reconsidere».
languages.original_text: "Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: «Lástima...». {n}El maestro del Coro deja caer los hombros y su rostro vuelve a adoptar su habitual expresión taciturna.{/n} «Esperaba que eso fuera lo bastante interesante para distraerl{mf|e|a} de la peligrosa idea que le trajo aquí, para no tener que implorarle que lo reconsidere».

languages.text: 「残念だよ…」{n}クワイアーマスターは肩を落とし、いつもの不機嫌な表情に戻った。{/n}「好奇心をそそるこの件が、あなたをここまで来させたその危険な思考をどこかに追いやって、考え直すよう頼む必要がなくなることを期待していたのだが」
languages.original_text: "Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: 「残念だよ…」{n}クワイアーマスターは肩を落とし、いつもの不機嫌な表情に戻った。{/n}「好奇心をそそるこの件が、あなたをここまで来させたその危険な思考をどこかに追いやって、考え直すよう頼む必要がなくなることを期待していたのだが」

languages.text: “真遗憾……”{n}唱诗大师的肩膀垂了下来，脸上再次恢复了一直以来的阴沉表情。{/n}“我本希望这个有趣的信息能转移您的注意力，让您不再关注那个危险的想法，这样我就不必恳求您重新考虑了。”
languages.original_text: "Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: “真遗憾……”{n}唱诗大师的肩膀垂了下来，脸上再次恢复了一直以来的阴沉表情。{/n}“我本希望这个有趣的信息能转移您的注意力，让您不再关注那个危险的想法，这样我就不必恳求您重新考虑了。”

languages.text: "Ein Jammer ..." {n}Die Schultern des Chormeisters sacken nach unten und sein Gesicht nimmt wieder seinen üblichen mürrischen Ausdruck an.{/n} "Ich hatte gehofft, diese sonderbare Nachricht würde Euch von der gefährlichen Idee ablenken, die Euch hergeführt hat, und ich müsste Euch nicht anflehen, es Euch anders zu überlegen."
languages.original_text: "Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Jammer ..." {n}Die Schultern des Chormeisters sacken nach unten und sein Gesicht nimmt wieder seinen üblichen mürrischen Ausdruck an.{/n} "Ich hatte gehofft, diese sonderbare Nachricht würde Euch von der gefährlichen Idee ablenken, die Euch hergeführt hat, und ich müsste Euch nicht anflehen, es Euch anders zu überlegen."

languages.text: « Dommage... {n}répond le maître de chœur alors que ses épaules s'affaissent et que son visage retrouve sa morosité coutumière.{/n} J'espérais que cette curieuse missive vous détournerait de l'idée ô combien dangereuse qui vous amène, ce qui m'aurait évité de chercher à vous en dissuader. »
languages.original_text: "Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: « Dommage... {n}répond le maître de chœur alors que ses épaules s'affaissent et que son visage retrouve sa morosité coutumière.{/n} J'espérais que cette curieuse missive vous détournerait de l'idée ô combien dangereuse qui vous amène, ce qui m'aurait évité de chercher à vous en dissuader. »

languages.text: "Yazık oldu..." {n}Koro Şefi'nin omuzları öne eğiliyor. Yüzüne her zamanki somurtkan ifade hâkim.{/n} "Tuhaf mesajın dikkatinizi dağıtarak sizi buraya getiren tehlikeli fikri aklınızdan çıkaracağını, böylece tekrar düşünmenizi rica etmeme gerek kalmayacağımı umuyordum."
languages.original_text: "Pity..." {n}The Choirmaster's shoulders go limp and his face resumes its usual sullen expression.{/n} "I was hoping that curious dispatch would distract you from the dangerous idea that brought you here, and I would not have to implore you to reconsider."
